INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I love using hands on kinesthetic and tactile learning opportunities with the students, it brings practical application of what is being taught in the lesson or assignment and helps students engage and learn across multiple modalities. I have used various options that I have learned in the past previously and love the opportunity and chance to challenge my learning, teaching, and growth as well as share it within the classroom while teaching.
